Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.Client
public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a Client, it starts the View in GUI or CLI.

  • Method Details

    • setEnded

      public void setEnded​(boolean ended)
      sets the phase of the game.
      Parameters:
      ended - true if the game is going to end, else false.

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts on a new thread, the CLI or the GUI and remains listening from server messages

    • send

      public void send​(MessageToServer message)
      sends the specified message to the server.
      Parameters:
      message - specified MessageToServer to send to the server.

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Starts the Client
      Parameters:
      args - 3 argument needed: + Server Ip Address + Server Port + Mode: cli/gui

    • getGameView

      public GameView getGameView()
      gives the gameView class of the current game.
      Returns:
      the gameView class of the current game.

    • setNicknames

      public void setNicknames​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> nicknames)
      saves the nicknames of the opponents and initializes the player's views
      Parameters:
      nicknames - array list of strings containing the nicknames of the players that are playing the current game.

    • getNickname

      public java.lang.String getNickname()
      gives the nickname chosen by this client.
      Returns:
      a string containing the nickname chosen by this client.

    • getTurns

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTurns()
      gives all the players of the game
      Returns:
      arrayList of nicknames ordered by the turns order.

    • closeSocket

      private void closeSocket()
      close the connection with the client.

    • stopTheGame

      public void stopTheGame()
      stops the game and closes the connection.

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning()
      checks if the client is still running
      Returns:
      true if the client is still running, else false.

    • updateTimer

      private void updateTimer()
      checks if 30 seconds are passed, if so, then it sends a ping to server.
